text: HORRIBLE SERVICE!!! She hung up on me when i called back to tell them we got the wrong pizza. Instead of trying to figure out what went wrong or to make the customer happy she hung up on me yet again. Good luck if u order here!
I think they're food is pretty good. I love the ham hoagie. The pizza is very good too. Best of all are the prices. They are by far the lowest in town.
